definition: A word or phrase used to represent a concept  that follows a specific naming convention suitable for machine use
The preferred lexical label for a resource, in a given language
Used to organize properties within classes for easier human understanding.
The semantic boundaries for which a term is valid and has meaning within the context of a dwc:Material
A descriptive statement that supplies a complete explanation of the intended meaning of the type and serves to differentiate it from related concepts.
Supplies an example of concept usage
Information on how a term is to be used.
One or more related resources from which the described resource is derived or based
General classification of the domain of values, loosely adhering to the primitive types in XML Schema Data Types and JSON Schema
Declaration of whether or not a resource is required within the context of the vocabulary expressed as a boolean value
Statement or statements that provide further information on any part of a terminological entry
Notes for an editor, translator or maintainer of the vocabulary.
